title: Real Estate Tenant Coordinator
job_overview:
About the Role:
We’re seeking a detail-oriented and highly organized Virtual Assistant to support a growing real
estate team specializing in property management, wholesaling, and fix-and-flip projects. This
role is focused on tenant coordination for a portfolio of rental properties, with the opportunity
to grow into broader real estate support functions.
You’ll play a key role in helping match qualified tenants to available properties by managing
listings, coordinating showings, and serving as the first point of contact for rental inquiries.

Key Responsibilities
• Create, manage, and update online property listings across multiple platforms
• Respond to rental inquiries via phone, email, or text
• Pre-screen tenant applications based on provided criteria
• Schedule and coordinate showings with local agents
• Maintain organized tracking of all applicant interactions using Google Sheets or CRM
• Follow up with prospective tenants and relay qualified leads to the team
• Support the leasing process with document collection and tenant communication
• Provide general administrative support as needed
